thread.title: Jameis Winston admits to poor word choice about girls at St. Pete school, report says
thread.title_full: Jameis Winston admits to poor word choice about girls at St. Pete school, report says

title: Jameis Winston admits to poor word choice about girls at St. Pete school, report says
text:
Jameis Winston admits to poor word choice about girls at St. Pete school, report says Jameis Winston discusses his progress and training 
Tampa Bay Bucs quarterback Jameis Winston talks about his progress and training with Tom Shaw at the ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. 
Tampa Bay Bucs quarterback Jameis Winston talks about his progress and training with Tom Shaw at the ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. Wire reports 
Tampa Bay Buccaneers quarterback Jameis Winston delivered a positive message to elementary-school students in St. Petersburg on Wednesday. 
He made an extremely poor word choice, though, one that he admitted later. Winston was the subject of sexual-abuse allegations while at FSU, but he has strived to repair his image. For some, his words at Melrose Elementary overshadowed what he was trying to convey. 
To read a Tampa Bay Times column on what Winston said, click here .
